EmailTemplate.subject: You are invited to an ASA Training Event!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join ASA!
International FFELP guarantor American Student Assistance® (ASA) has designed a training event to discuss some of the most pressing topics affecting financial aid.
Dates and Time: Thursday, November 5, 2009 14:00 - 15:00 GMT 9:00 a.m. EST - 10:00 a.m. EST
Tuesday, November 10, 2009 14:00 - 15:00 GMT 9:00 a.m. EST - 10:00 a.m. EST
Course Description: Needs Analysis & Professional Judgment During Difficult Economic Times During these tough economics times, College Staff will need to respond to difficult situations regarding job loss, retirement fund depletion and other financial loss. How is EFC calculated? This session will take a look at the calculations and formulas. The basics of Professional Judgment and how to use it to assist a family in financial crisis will also be covered, along with sample case studies.
Who Should Attend: School financial aid administrators interested in the most up to date information.
How to register or for additional information.
· Register online: http://www.amsa.com/fap/training/index.cfm · Email: send your name, phone number and enrollment details to training@amsa.com · Phone: call the Training Department at (800) 999-9080, ext. 3099 (1-617-728-4200)
All American Student Assistance training events are offered free of charge, however the dial-in conference call will be at international rates for a call to the U.S.
